description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任上海市人民政府办公厅主任、上海市人大常委会副主任，现任上海市政协副主席。
description.en: A political figure in the People's Republic of China, formerly Director of the General Office of the Shanghai Municipal People's Government and Vice Chairman of the Standing Committee of the Shanghai Municipal People's Congress, currently serving as Vice Chairman of the Shanghai Municipal Committee of the CPPCC.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国湖北省下辖的地级市。
description.en: A prefecture-level city in Hubei Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的国家，通常简称为“中国”。
description.en: A country in East Asia, commonly known as 'China'.

nodes.id: 上海市人民政府办公厅

zh-cn: 上海市人民政府办公厅
en: General Office of Shanghai Municipal People's Government

description.zh-cn: 上海市人民政府的综合性办事机构。
description.en: The general affairs office of the Shanghai Municipal People's Government.

nodes.id: 上海市孙中山宋庆龄文物管理委员会

zh-cn: 上海市孙中山宋庆龄文物管理委员会
en: Shanghai Sun Yat-sen and Soong Ching Ling Cultural Relics Management Committee

description.zh-cn: 负责管理上海市孙中山和宋庆龄相关文物的机构。
description.en: An institution responsible for managing cultural relics related to Sun Yat-sen and Soong Ching Ling in Shanghai.

nodes.id: 上海市人民代表大会常务委员会

zh-cn: 上海市人民代表大会常务委员会
en: Standing Committee of the Shanghai Municipal People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 上海市人民代表大会的常设机关。
description.en: The standing body of the Shanghai Municipal People's Congress.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议上海市委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议上海市委员会
en: Shanghai Municipal Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议在上海市的地方组织。
description.en: The local organization of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference in Shanghai.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.
Xiao Guiyu is from Xiaogan, Hubei.

relationships.target: 上海市人民政府办公厅

description.zh-cn: 肖贵玉曾任上海市人民政府办公厅主任、党组书记，该职务于2018年2月由汤志平接任。
description.en: Xiao Guiyu served as Director and Party Group Secretary of the General Office of the Shanghai Municipal People's Government, a position taken over by Tang Zhiping in February 2018.

relationships.target: 上海市孙中山宋庆龄文物管理委员会

description.zh-cn: 肖贵玉曾兼任上海市孙中山宋庆龄文物管理委员会主任。
description.en: Xiao Guiyu concurrently served as Director of the Shanghai Sun Yat-sen and Soong Ching Ling Cultural Relics Management Committee.

relationships.target: 上海市人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 肖贵玉在卸任上海市政府办公厅主任后，转任上海市人大常委会副主任。
description.en: After leaving his position as Director of the General Office of the Shanghai Municipal Government, Xiao Guiyu was appointed Vice Chairman of the Standing Committee of the Shanghai Municipal People's Congress.

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议上海市委员会

description.zh-cn: 2023年1月，肖贵玉出任中国人民政治协商会议上海市委员会副主席。
description.en: In January 2023, Xiao Guiyu was appointed Vice Chairman of the Shanghai Municipal Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 根据其任职经历和页面分类，肖贵玉是中国共产党党员。
description.en: Based on his official career and page categorization, Xiao Guiyu is a member of the Communist Party of China.
